titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Child and Adolescent Mental Health Needs Based Grouping Tool - Description

div.p: The Child and Adolescent Mental Health Needs Based Grouping Tool is a type of Clustering Tool for child and adolescent PATIENTS receiving Mental Health care.
The Child and Adolescent Mental Health Needs Based Grouping Tool is a tool designed to categorise the need for advice or help of children, young people and/or families referred to a SERVICE.

For further information on the Child and Adolescent Mental Health Needs Based Grouping Tool, see "A Guide to Choosing Needs-Based Groupings in Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services to Inform Payment Systems".
